episodes.title: Coleman and the Cult
episodes.description: The gap between wellness culture and conspiracy theories is smaller than most realize—something Coleman Watts and Daniela discovered firsthand. Their extraordinary journey from deep immersion in false beliefs to champions of critical thinking offers a masterclass in how our minds can both deceive and liberate us. Coleman's Video - Sex, Lies, and the Mercola Tapes Send the Why Smart Women Podcast a Message Proudly sponsored by COUP — helping brands cut through the noise with bold, smart marketing.
